string.value: Apparently, the place that makes the best buckwheat paste in Korean Folk Town is Chil Nam's...

I went to Chil Nam's place because he was apparently the best at making buckwheat paste in Folk Town. He asked for 4 Tiger Stamps and 1,000 mesos in return for some buckwheat paste.\n\n#t4000170# #b#c4000170##k/4
I gave Chil Nam 4 #t4000170#s and 1,000 mesos for 2 buckwheat pastes.

You are the one that helped us brothers out before, right? How can I help you this time? Please don't tell me you're here at the request of my older brother...\r\n#L0# #bCan I get some buckwheat paste?#k

Buckwheat paste? Well, you've come to the right place. We make the best buckwheat paste in Folk Town, no question. The thing is, I was just about to leave to get something, and ... if you can get me the item, then I'll give you some buckwheat paste.
Please get me #b4 Tiger Stamps#k and I'll make the buckwheat paste for you for only #b1,000 mesos#k per.
Aren't you here because you need some buckwheat paste?
Wow, you really brought it! Since you have worked hard at bringing me the Tiger Stamps, I'll give you the buckwheat paste as promised. It really tastes good, you know.
If you want some buckwheat paste again, then by all means come see me. Please know that it takes me at least 6 hours to make one.
Please get me 4 Tiger Stamps and I'll make some buckwheat paste for you.
